item.description:
Incubators!

I hope you are all having a great week! Kick off July and Independence Day by being on the spot and making some improvised fireworks.

This week my backyard will be host to the incubator as it's going to be perfect weather outside!!!

As usual I'll guide us through a fun, silly, and wacky list of exercises and games! Bring some friends, smiles, and most importantly relax. This week maybe bring a jacket too, it might get cooler outside toward the end of the night.

Afterwards we'll monkey our way over to central square and grab some grub and even some ice cream!

Let's bring the laughs to my awesome backyard! Just come around back once you get there

...and if you are driving there is usual at least one if not 2+ parking spots available. Just pull around back!

Cheers!

Jason

p.s. palm tree, swingset, and that particular backyard not mine and not included in this meetup, haha.
item.name: Cambridge Forever After Improv'D
